scripts.build:ui: @powershell if (Test-Path ./build/) {Remove-Item ./build/ -Recurse -Force} && cd ../../part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item ./build/ -Recurse ../../part3/phonebook/
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
